name: Cornelius
description: {{Nihongo|'''Keigo Oyamada'''|小山田 圭吾|Oyamada Keigo|born January 27, 1969}}, also known by his moniker {{Nihongo|'''Cornelius'''|CORNELIUS（コーネリアス)|Kōneriasu}}, is a Japanese musician and producer who co-founded [[Flipper's Guitar]], an influential [[Shibuya-kei]] band, and subsequently embarked on a solo career.
